isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - INVERSION VALVE (BENDIX SR-1) - DISASSEMBLE

svcproc.title: DISASSEMBLE
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 31 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove socket head pipe plug (Item 10) at check valve (Item 7).
Remove check valve spring (Item 9), spring guide (Item 8) and check valve (Item 7).
Remove two screws, then remove exhaust cover (Item 2).
Remove inlet and exhaust valve assembly (Item 13).
Remove inlet and exhaust valve cap nut (Item 14) and separate cap nut O-ring (Item 15).
Remove valve stop (Item 16), valve spring (Item 17) and inlet and exhaust valve (Item 13).
Remove four screws and lockwashers that secure cover to the body.
Remove cover (Item 2) and three piston springs (Item 21).

warning.para: Cover is under a spring load and should be held while removing screws to avoid personal injury.

step1.para: Remove small piston and small and large O-rings (Items 5 and 3).
Remove large piston and large and small O-rings (Items 3 and 5).
